column1: Why did the girl reject the landfill owner? his place is a dump
column3: Refers to a place for waste and a derogatory term for a messy situation
column4: The city plans to close the old dump to create a park for residents.
column5: After the party, the house was a complete dump, with trash everywhere.

column1: What do a condom and a fighter jet have in common? a cockpit.
column3: Refers to the area in an aircraft and a safe zone for intimate activities.
column4: The pilot adjusted the controls in the cockpit during turbulence.
column5: The couple found a quiet cockpit in the club where they could dance without being disturbed.

column1: I can swallow two bits of string... and they will come out tied together. i shit you knot!
column3: Refers to a tied piece of string and something intricate or complicated.
column4: She learned how to tie a knot for sailing.
column5: The tangled mess of wires was a real knot to untangle.
